extension.description: With this addon you can stream content from UR (ur.se).
Med denna addon kan du strömma innehåll från UR (ur.se).
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial addon and it is not supported or maintained by SVT. Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
